required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Long-term Extension to Study AC-058B301 to Investigate Safety, Tolerability and Disease Control of Ponesimod 20 mg in Patients With Relapsing Multiple Sclerosis
clinical_study.official_title: Multicenter, Non-comparative Extension to Study AC-058B301, to Investigate the Long-term Safety, Tolerability, and Control of Disease of Ponesimod 20 mg in Subjects With Relapsing Multiple Sclerosis

brief_summary.textblock: The study AC-058B301 (OPTIMUM; NCT02425644) has been designed to investigate the efficacy, safety and tolerability of ponesimod in subjects with relapsing multiple sclerosis (RMS). The AC-058B303 study is the long-term extension for the core study AC-058B301. The purpose of this long term extension of the core study AC-058B301 is to characterize the long-term safety, tolerability, and control of disease of ponesimod 20 mg in subjects with RMS.

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: This is a single-group open-label extension study to investigate long-term safety, tolerability and control of disease of ponesimod 20 mg in subjects with RMS. Statistical analyses will be descriptive and therefore all endpoints are exploratory in nature. All exploratory endpoints are listed under primary outcomes.

primary_outcome.measure: Annualized confirmed relapse rate (ARR)
primary_outcome.time_frame: Analysis period: From day 1 in core study (Enrollment) to end-of-treatment (EOT) in the extension study, i.e. for up to 354 weeks
primary_outcome.description: defined as the number of confirmed relapses per subject-year

primary_outcome.measure: Time from core study randomization to first confirmed relapse
primary_outcome.time_frame: Analysis period: From day 1 in core study (Enrollment) to end-of-treatment (EOT) in the extension study, i.e. for up to 354 weeks
primary_outcome.description: Time from enrollment in core study to first confirmed relapse

primary_outcome.measure: Time to first 12-week confirmed disability accumulation (CDA)
primary_outcome.time_frame: Analysis period: From day 1 in core study (Enrollment) to end-of-treatment (EOT) in the extension study, i.e. for up to 354 weeks
primary_outcome.description: Time from core baseline to first 12-week CDA

primary_outcome.measure: Time to first 24-week confirmed disability accumulation (CDA)
primary_outcome.time_frame: Analysis period: From day 1 in core study (Enrollment) to end-of-treatment (EOT) in the extension study, i.e. for up to 354 weeks
primary_outcome.description: Time from core baseline to first 24-week CDA

primary_outcome.measure: Patients with absence of relapses
primary_outcome.time_frame: Analysis period: From day 1 in core study (Enrollment) to end-of-treatment (EOT) in the extension study, i.e. for up to 354 weeks
primary_outcome.description: Number of patients with absence of relapses during study period

primary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in Expanded Disability Status Scale (EDSS)
primary_outcome.time_frame: Analysis period: From day 1 in core study (Enrollment) to end-of-treatment (EOT) in the extension study, i.e. for up to 354 weeks
primary_outcome.description: Change from baseline in EDSS at all assessments

primary_outcome.measure: Assessment of no evidence of disease activity (NEDA) status at week 108 and end-of treatment (EOT) according to NEDA 3
primary_outcome.time_frame: Analysis period: From day 1 in core study (Enrollment) to end-of-treatment (EOT) in the extension study, i.e. for up to 354 weeks
primary_outcome.description: NEDA 3 defined by the absence of confirmed relapse, GD+ T1 lesions, new or enlarging T2 lesions and 12-week CDA

primary_outcome.measure: Assessment of no evidence of disease activity (NEDA) status at week 108 and end-of treatment (EOT) according to NEDA 4
primary_outcome.time_frame: Analysis period: From day 1 in core study (Enrollment) to end-of-treatment (EOT) in the extension study, i.e. for up to 354 weeks
primary_outcome.description: NEDA 4 defined by the absence of confirmed relapse, GD+ T1 lesions, new or enlarging T2 lesions and 12-week CDA, and annual brain volume change â‰¥ -0.4% from baseline to all assessments

primary_outcome.measure: Percent change from baseline in brain volume (PCBV) measured by magnetic resonance imaging (MRI)
primary_outcome.time_frame: Analysis period: From day 1 in core study (Enrollment) to end-of-treatment (EOT) in the extension study, i.e. for up to 354 weeks
primary_outcome.description: Change from baseline in brain volume at all assessments

primary_outcome.measure: Cumulative number of combined unique active lesions (CUAL) measured by MRI
primary_outcome.time_frame: Analysis period: From day 1 in core study (Enrollment) to end-of-treatment (EOT) in the extension study, i.e. for up to 354 weeks
primary_outcome.description: Cumulative number of combined unique active lesions (CUAL) defined as new Gd+ T1 lesions plus new or enlarging T2 lesions (without double-counting the lesions) at all assessments

primary_outcome.measure: Determination of number of Gd+ T1 lesions by MRI
primary_outcome.time_frame: Analysis period: From day 1 in core study (Enrollment) to end-of-treatment (EOT) in the extension study, i.e. for up to 354 weeks
primary_outcome.description: Number of Gd+ T1 lesions at all assessments

primary_outcome.measure: Cumulative number of new or enlarging T2 lesions measured by MRI
primary_outcome.time_frame: Analysis period: From day 1 in core study (Enrollment) to end-of-treatment (EOT) in the extension study, i.e. for up to 354 weeks
primary_outcome.description: Cumulative number of new or enlarging T2 lesions (relative to baseline) at all assessments

primary_outcome.measure: Assessment of volume of brain lesions measured by MRI
primary_outcome.time_frame: Analysis period: From day 1 in core study (Enrollment) to end-of-treatment (EOT) in the extension study, i.e. for up to 354 weeks
primary_outcome.description: Determination of MRI lesions (T2 lesions, T1 hypointense lesions) at all assessments

primary_outcome.measure: Absence of MRI lesions
primary_outcome.time_frame: Analysis period: From day 1 in core study (Enrollment) to end-of-treatment (EOT) in the extension study, i.e. for up to 354 weeks
primary_outcome.description: Absence of MRI lesions (Gd+ T1 lesions, new or enlarging T2 lesions) at all assessments

primary_outcome.measure: Determination of proportion of Gd+ lesions at baseline evolving to persistent black holes (PBHs)
primary_outcome.time_frame: Analysis period: From day 1 in core study (Enrollment) to end-of-treatment (EOT) in the extension study, i.e. for up to 354 weeks
primary_outcome.description: Proportion of Gd+ lesions at baseline evolving to PBHs at all assessments

primary_outcome.measure: Estimation of incidence rates of adverse events (AEs)
primary_outcome.time_frame: Analysis period: From day 1 in core study (Enrollment) to end-of-treatment (EOT) in the extension study, i.e. for up to 354 weeks
primary_outcome.description: Incidence rates of treatment-emergent AEs, severe AEs, AEs of special interest and AEs leading to premature discontinuation of study treatment

primary_outcome.measure: Estimation of incidence rates of treatment-emergent morphological ECG abnormalities
primary_outcome.time_frame: Analysis period: From day 1 in core study (Enrollment) to end-of-treatment (EOT) in the extension study, i.e. for up to 354 weeks
primary_outcome.description: ECG abnormalities as defined by the ECG provider

primary_outcome.measure: Assessment of cardiac rhythms measured by electrocardiogram (ECG) parameters
primary_outcome.time_frame: Analysis period: From day 1 in core study (Enrollment) to end-of-treatment (EOT) in the extension study, i.e. for up to 354 weeks
primary_outcome.description: Absolute values by visit for 12-lead ECG parameters (HR, PR, QRS, QT, QTcB, QTcF)

primary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline values by visit for cardiac rhythms
primary_outcome.time_frame: Analysis period: From day 1 in core study (Enrollment) to end-of-treatment (EOT) in the extension study, i.e. for up to 354 weeks
primary_outcome.description: Change from baseline values by visit for ECG parameters (HR, PR, QRS, QT, QTcB, QTcF)

primary_outcome.measure: Change in ECG parameters from pre-dose to selected post-dose assessments
primary_outcome.time_frame: Analysis period: From day 1 in extension study to end-of-treatment (EOT) in extension study, i.e. for up to 240 weeks
primary_outcome.description: Change in ECG parameters (HR, PR, QRS, QT, QTcB, QTcF) from pre-dose to selected post-dose assessments (1h, 2h, 3h, 4h) on day 1 of extension study and on day of re-initiation of study treatment

primary_outcome.measure: Absolute values and percent change from baseline in forced expiratory volume and forced vital capacity
primary_outcome.time_frame: Analysis period: From day 1 in core study (Enrollment) to end-of-treatment (EOT) in the extension study, i.e. for up to 354 weeks
primary_outcome.description: Absolute values and percent change from baseline in forced expiratory volume in 1 second (FEV1) and forced vital capacity (FVC) at all assessments

primary_outcome.measure: Assessment of treatment-emergent decrease from baseline in forced expiratory volume and forced vital capacity
primary_outcome.time_frame: Analysis period: From day 1 in core study (Enrollment) to end-of-treatment (EOT) in the extension study, i.e. for up to 354 weeks
primary_outcome.description: Determination of treatment-emergent decrease from baseline in FEV1 and FVC (absolute and % of predicted)

primary_outcome.measure: Absolute change from baseline to end-of-study (EOS) versus change from baseline to end-of-treatment (EOT) in forced expiratory volume and forced vital capacity
primary_outcome.time_frame: Analysis period: From day 1 in core study (Enrollment) to end-of-treatment (EOT) in the extension study, i.e. for up to 354 weeks
primary_outcome.description: Absolute change from baseline to end-of-study (EOS) versus change from baseline to end-of-treatment (EOT) in FEV1 and FVC (absolute and % of predicted)

intervention.description: Ponesimod; Film-coated tablet; Oral use. From Day 1 to Day 14, ponesimod is gradually up-titrated until a maintenance dose of 20 mg is reached from Day 15
